question.text:
Match the following:
 
  Column I   Column II
1 IAA (i) Herring sperm DNA
2 ABA (ii) Bolting
3 Ethylene (iii) Stomatal closure
4 GA (iv) Weed–free lawns
5 Cytokinin (v) Ripening of fruits

options.text: <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text: Synthetic auxin  <math><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></math>  is used as a weedicide and is used to remove dicot weed from monocot field.ABA commonly called as stress hormone causes closure of stomata. Ethylene is only gaseous hormone and it causes ripening of fruits.GA causes rapid intermodal elongation in genetically dwarf plants or rosette plants, the phenomenon is known as bolting. Cytokinin was first isolated by autoclaving herring fish sperm DNA.
